intro.description: These next steps will create a Test Case which will fail, so that an Event Handler can fix the error.

item.title: Create a Test Case
item.description:
Create a new Test Case called:
Check if checkbox is selected

subitem.label: Open the Test Case Editor for the "Check if checkbox is selected" Test Case.
In the Test Case Browser, open the category: "unbound_modules_concrete/Actions(basic)/Check/Button Component"
Drag the Test Case "ub_btc_checkSelection" into the Test Case Editor for the "Check if checkbox is selected" Test Case.
Enter a component name for this Test Case, e.g. TechnicsTab_Bonus_btc
Enter "true" for the SELECTED parameter in the properties view
Save the Test Case and add it to a Test Suite. Specify "DVDTool" as the AUT in the Properties View for the Test Suite Editor.
Start the DVD Tool AUT and create a DVD manually. Switch to the Technics tab, where you can see the "Bonus" checkbox.
Map the bonus checkbox to the component name from the Test Case.
Execute the test on the DVD tool. The test will fail because the checkbox is not selected.
